review: Good price, works as advertised with both iPad and iPhone apps. Wish it worked with Amazon video, but it does not. I own an Apple TV (also no Amazon video capability). Therefore my option is to buy video content from Google or Apple or another device (Fire TV) from Amazon. Don't think I'll be doing that anytime soon. Make sure you understand what you can and can't access via these devices before you purchase any of them.
